channel.title: BMRF Emergency Broadcast on YouTube?
channel.description:
So, I made this video to get people ready and pumped up for the big release tomorrow. All I pretty much did is match the site in video editing (the Broadcast, sound, Bad TV effect) and I put links to the site and stuff in the description. Also, the video isn't monetized. I was wondering if I could keep this up and if others wanted to they could spread it around? All I want is to support the AWESOME mod and it's team :smiley: .
Here is the video: [url='https://youtu.be/wVG0pjzDX58']The Video[/url]
I hope this is pleasing to all!
